trans-unit.source: Creates a user interface element that enables users to invoke ASP.NET event handlers and it provides a means to post user input from UI elements back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et element i brukergrensesnittet kan brukere aktivere ASP.NET hendelsesbehandling og det gir en måte å postere brukerinndata fra UI-elementene på serveren.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The Command control displays as an interactive UI element on the requesting device.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen kontrollen vises som et interaktivt UI-element på forespurt enhet.

trans-unit.source: The label of the UI element comes from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property, which is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: Etiketten for UI-elementet kommer fra <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>egenskapen som er arvet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>base klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Avoid using special characters in ASP.NET mobile Web page URLs.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Unngå å bruke spesialtegn i ASP.NET mobile nettsiden URL-adresser.

trans-unit.source: The HREF tags generated for posting `Command` events back to the server are not strictly validated.
trans-unit.target: HREF-koder som er generert for postering `Command` hendelser tilbake til serveren ikke er absolutt validert.

trans-unit.source: For example, a URL that includes spaces results in the generation of WML that cannot be handled by some WML browsers.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel fører en URL som inneholder mellomrom til generering av WML som ikke kan behandles noen WML lesere.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the specified control causes server-side validation to occur on all controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om den angitte kontrollen får serversiden valideringen på alle kontroller i skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: For validation to occur on a form, the form must be submitted with a control that raises validation, and must have its CausesValidation property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Validering kan forekomme i et skjema må sende inn skjemaet med en kontroll som opphøyer validering, og må ha egenskapen CausesValidation `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control is currently the only control that raises validation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollen er den eneste kontrollen som opphøyer validering.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control causes server-side validation to occur on all controls on the form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte kontrollen får serversiden valideringen på alle kontroller i skjemaet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user activates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en bruker aktiverer en <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control is activated, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollen er aktivert, den opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Device-Specific Rendering" and "Device-Specific Behavior" sections in <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, se "Enheten-spesifikke gjengivelse" og "Enheten-spesifikke virkemåten" i <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the argument associated with the command in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Angir eller returnerer argumentet som er knyttet til kommandoen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The argument associated with the command in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet som er knyttet til kommandoen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kommandonavnet på som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the render style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjengivelse stilen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: Access the two available types through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Få tilgang til de to typene som er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName> (default) The command is rendered as a button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>(standard) Kommandoen gjengis som en knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName> The command is rendered as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>Kommandoen gjengis som en kobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Format property supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName> value only on devices that support JavaScript as indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For egenskapen støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>verdi bare for enheter som støtter JavaScript, som angitt av den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat"></xref> value indicating the render style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat"> </xref> verdi som angir gjengivelse stilen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the URL of the image source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control when the control is rendered as an image button.
trans-unit.target: Angir eller returnerer URL-adressen for bildekilden den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> kontrollerer når kontrollen gjengis som et bildeknappen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not <xref:System.String.Empty> and the device can handle image buttons, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control uses the image instead of a button or link text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er <xref:System.String.Empty>og enheten kan håndtere bildet knappene den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollen bruker bildet i stedet for en tekst for knappen eller koblingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> when the control is rendered as an image button.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen for bildekilden den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> når kontrollen gjengis som et bildeknappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control submits the form.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen sender skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: Mobile controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>, can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission.
trans-unit.target: Mobil kontroller, for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>, kan overstyre denne metoden for å finne ut om dette er en kontroll som brukes for innsending av skjemaet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be submit controls, for example, by checking for specific properties.
trans-unit.target: Andre kontroller kan utvides ved å formidle logikken for å programmatisk finne ut om de må til å sende kontroller, for eksempel ved å kontrollere for bestemte egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> method to capture the postback event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En kontroll anses å være en form-submit kontroll bare hvis den implementerer <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>metoden capture hendelsen sende tilbake.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den ikke er registrert for hendelsesbehandlingen standard selv om metoden returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control submits the form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen sender skjemaet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a command that is associated with an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren velger en kommando som er knyttet til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: When an ItemCommand event handler is defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Når en ItemCommand hendelsesbehandling er definert, den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollen varsler behandlingsprogrammet når en hendelse for elementet genereres ved samhandling mellom brukere.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> event, the ItemCommand event is bubbled up to the parent controls.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>hendelsen ItemCommand hendelsen bubbled opptil overordnede kontrollene.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event rendering is device-specific and is discussed in detail in the "Device-Specific Behavior" section of <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: ItemCommand hendelsen gjengivelse er enheten-spesifikke og beskrives i detalj under "Enheten-spesifikke virkemåte" av <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnItemCommand%2A> event is raised after an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnItemCommand%2A>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnItemCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: In a scenario where you repeat the same set of actions each time a command button is clicked, you can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control to identify which command button the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: I et scenario der du gjentar samme sett med handlinger hver gang kommando klikkes, kan du bruke enten den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollen til å identifisere hvilken kommando button brukeren klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the adapter associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control has handled loading the post data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om adapteren knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> kontrollen har behandlet under innlasting av post-dataene.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Different devices might provide their data back to the calling server in different ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Forskjellige enheter kan inneholde dataene sine kall serveren på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the name of a parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til navnet på en parameter-samling.

trans-unit.source: A parameter collection of postback data.
trans-unit.target: En parameter samling sende tilbake data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the adapter associated with this control has handled loading the post data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kortet som er forbundet med håndtert denne kontrollen under innlasting av post-data. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the user activates the control.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når brukeren aktiverer kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the OnClick method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av metoden OnClick opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override the OnClick method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: Arving klasser kan overstyre metoden OnClick for å utføre andre oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: An object defined by an <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er definert av en <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the user activates the control.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når brukeren aktiverer kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: Arving klasser kan overstyre denne metoden for å utføre andre oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCommand event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: OnItemCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you must take the same actions for multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> buttons.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du må gjøre samme for flere <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>knapper.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control to identify which <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollen for å identifisere hvilke <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>ble brukt.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control when it is clicked to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent er brukt internt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollerer når den klikkes opphøye en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler ASP.NET-programmet som tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref> kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent kan overstyres i et avledet klassen for å endre hendelser for den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the label used when a softkey is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Angir eller returnerer etiketten som skal brukes når en tasten vises.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: This property is used only for devices that support softkeys.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare for enheter som støtter softkeys.

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property of the control is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er tom, den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>kontrollen brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is empty or its length is less than 9, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is used for the softkey label.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>-egenskapen er tom eller den er mindre enn 9, den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>egenskapen brukes for tasten etiketten.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the word `Go` (if it is a submit control command) is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ordet `Go` (Hvis det er en Send kontroll-kommando) vises.

trans-unit.source: The value of the SoftkeyLabel property is truncated to 12 characters (the standard maximum length of a softkey).
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen SoftkeyLabel er avkortet 12 tegn (standard maksimumslengden for en tasten).

trans-unit.source: The label used when a soft key is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Etiketten som skal brukes når en myk nøkkel vises.

trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the name of a parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til navnet på en parameter-samling.

trans-unit.source: A parameter collection of postback data.
trans-unit.target: En parameter samling sende tilbake data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the adapter handles loading the post data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kortet behandler innlasting av post-data. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
